name: USC: Ultimate Shove Club
description:
- If you have an itch.io account, please vote for our game on the right! -

Welcome to the USC: Ultimate Shove Club! Do you have what it takes to rise from the rank of Shove Scrub to become the Shove Master?

The object of the game is to score 1000 points by standing in the glowing yellow goal. You can shoot a Shove Beam at the other players to knock them backwards (and hopefully off the map!).

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Fire Shove Beam

Esc - Menu

Protip: You can rocket jump!

Protip #2: If your game loses focus, hit Esc and click Return To Game to restore focus.

This is a multiplayer only game , so you'll be all alone unless you can convince some friends to play with you (or open extra browser windows!). All players play on the same Photon server worldwide, max 20 players.

Downloads

  • Windows
  • Mac OSX
  • Linux

USC: Ultimate Shove Club. A game about shoving your friends. Created for the 7DFPS Game Jam by  Harrison G. Pink, Jolie Menzel and Seth Rosen. Special thanks to Chris Maire for additional coding and to Jared Emerson-Johnson for all the music & audio.
